attraction_reviewComments: Situated right below the Ritz Carlton, Salt Creek Beach is a lovely spot with great waves for surfing or just wading in the water. There is a nice park which has picnic tables. If... read more
If you like a beautiful beach with plenty of parking try Salt Creek. Nice sand and seldom crowded. It has plenty of paid parking clost to the sand.

Stunning beach, super clean and beautiful sunsets. On a clear day you can see right over to Catalina Island.
Great place to relax and only a short walk from the Ritz Carlton. Lots of people exercising and surfing in the morning. More crowds after lunch.

The water was beautiful, and it wasn't crowded. Might have had something to do with it being a Thursday. They have parking available for $1 per hour.
For some reason this little stretch of beach gets nice and warm - great for tanning! Usually pretty quiet in the mornings also. I love coming and leaving before the crowds.

Just went to this area for the first time. Great beach with Mild to ruff surf, but great for a strong swimmer. You can snorkel, boogie board or grab some great waves.
Beautiful spot to watch sunset, go for a walk on the beach, watch the surfers and surf yourself. Parking lot available in 2 min walk

We loved this beach! Beautiful walk down, long but beautiful. Be sure to have comfy shoes on. The beach is immaculately clean as we found all the Laguna area beaches to be.
